text: Itâ€™s a chain roast meat stall. Probably nth to do with andy lau. Their charsiew is pretty gd and also reasonably priced. I ordered from them a couple of times before. A single portion charsiew+roast pork rice with egg is only $4.80. Damn..the price for the current state of economy is considered quite reasonable alr. I often takeaway 200gm of charsiew for my fam which costs $10. 1kg costs $45. They also have this Dangui roasted duck which iâ€™m tempted to try next. Itâ€™s something v quintessential msian. Dianxiaoer is known for it as well. But a whole duck here is only $45. Really not bad at all for a chain!

Bought char siew and roasted chicken rice. Looking at how char is thr char siew. Totally inedible. Threw all of them. Thin sliced chicken. Gave 3 stars for the polite staff, thats all. I would definitely ask for exchange if i was eating there. Waste of money

Ordered 1 duck rice and 1 chicken rice with egg. Paid $9.40 for it.

Got a shock when I opened it at home, just plain rice and sauce! NO CHICKEN AND EGG! First time such a thing happened in my life! Totally a scam shop. Beware!

Expensive, asked for lean meat, they give fatty and lean.

Totally not worth your money.
Ordered the charsiew rice, not much char is there.
